import { React, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import logo from "../images/logo.jpg"; import "../style/login.css"; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' function MyVerticallyCenteredModal(props) { return ( Design Pattern: PURE FABRICATION

Pure Fabrication

Fabricated class/ artificial class – assign set of related responsibilities that doesn't represent any domain object. ● Provides a highly cohesive set of activities. ● Behavioral decomposed – implements some algorithm. ● Examples: Adapter, Strategy ● Benefits: High cohesion, low coupling and can reuse this class.

Close ); } const Login = () => { const [modalShow, setModalShow] = useState(false); return ( <>
setModalShow(false)} />

Forget password? setModalShow(true)} /> setModalShow(false)} />
); } export default Login;
